result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steven Francisco Cervantes-Camarena

defendant.name: Cervantes-Camarena, Steven Francisco
defendant.address: 404 S Neenah Ave, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on December 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Court addresses request for bond modification.  Defendant requests cash bond be converted to signature bond.  State has no objection if all other conditions remain in effect, including drug patch.  Court grants request, converts cash bond to signature bond.

10:09 AM Defendant Steven Francisco Cervantes-Camarena appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. SPD still in process of finding counsel for defendant. Bond remains in effect.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:00 AM Defendant Steven Francisco Cervantes-Camarena appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Aleksandra Hodowany in court for State of Wisconsin. Court indicates defendant qualifies for SPD, has not been appointed counsel yet. Bond remains in effect.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:11 PM  Defendant Steven Francisco Cervantes-Camarena appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Carrie LaPlant appeared by video for Steven Cervantes-Camarena. Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel. Court questions Defendant on address/employment history. Court finds probable cause, sets bond. Return
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.
